rules_text:
Vigilance, hexproof
[i]Exalt's Deliverer[/i] – Whenever you cast a spell that is three or more colors, tap target creature an opponent controls and put two stun counters on them.
[i]Radiant Mastery[/i] – {T}: Add {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}. Whenever you cast a spell or activate an ability using this mana, for each different colored mana symbol in that spell or abilities cost, other creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
